weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you need an umbrella. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet.
🌧️ I come from clouds.
☔ You don't want to forget your umbrella when I am around.

weather.question: I am big and bright and warm in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I shine during the day.
🔥 I give you heat.
😎 You might need sunglasses when looking at me.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep.
🌬️ I can bring rain or sun.
☁️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make snowballs with me.
🥶 I am frozen water.
⛄ People make snowmen out of me.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make them dance. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I make leaves move.
💨 You can feel me on your face.
🪁 Kites love me.

weather.question: I come after the rain and show all the colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have a lot of colors.
☀️ You can only see me when the sun is out.
💧 I appear in an arc.

weather.question: I am very hot. You might see me in the desert. What am I?

hints.text: 🥵 I can make you sweat!
🌵 Deserts have a lot of me.
☀️ I am caused by the sun.

weather.question: I am a storm with lots of rain and sometimes thunder. What am I?

hints.text: ⛈️ I can be scary.
⚡ Lightning is a part of me.
☔ It is very important to take cover during me.

weather.question: I am a sudden, strong, gust of wind, usually short-lived. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ Sometimes I can knock your hat off.
🍂 I am stronger than a gentle breeze.
💨 I am a brief increase in the strength of the wind.

weather.question: I am a very big storm with strong winds that spins in a circle. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am a dangerous storm.
🏠 I can cause damage to buildings.
🌪️ I form over warm ocean waters.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I love to eat leaves, big and small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I start out as a tiny egg.
🐛 I change into a butterfly later.
🖐️ I have more legs than you do.

bug.question: I buzz around flowers and make yummy honey. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🌻 I love to visit flowers.
🍯 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and a symbol of good luck. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫️ I have round marks on my back.
🐞 People like to see me in their gardens.
🌱 I eat aphids.

bug.question: I march in lines and carry crumbs back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
🏠 I live underground in a colony.
💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and can jump very high. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am usually green.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
🦵 My legs are long.

bug.question: I fly around at night and love bright lights. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 People mistake me for fairies.
✨ I glow.
🌙 I only come out when it is dark.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and used to be a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I like to visit flowers.
🦋 I go through metamorphosis.
🌸 I drink nectar.

bug.question: I spin a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 Flies get stuck in my web.

bug.question: I can be green or brown and hide on leaves to ambush my prey. What am I?

hints.text: 🙏 People say I look like I'm praying.
🦗 I eat other bugs.
🌿 I blend in with the plants.

bug.question: I make a very loud buzzing sound in the summertime. I spend most of my life underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 You can hear me singing on hot days.
🌳 I emerge from the ground after many years.
🔊 I make a loud noise with my body.
